name: Cheese Your Fighter
description:
A fighting game where you attack faster when you move faster. Bounce on cheese to gain momentum.

Featuring
  • Innovative red headbands wearing protagonists
  • One (1) extendo-leg
  • Very functional physics
  • Completely original fireball attack
  • Menus
  • A flirtatious mouse
  • An adorable mouse
  • Freshly composed music
  • Relative amusement for up to and including two people
  • Multiple levels
  • Bouncy cheese
Controls
  • Player 1:
    • Q - extendo-leg kick
    • A - original fire ball like attack
    • S - left
    • F - right
    • E - jump
  • Player 2:
    • Enter - extendo-leg kick
    • Shift - original fire ball like attack
    • Left - left
    • Right- right
    • Up - jump
Reviews

"......... interesting"

- My Mum
